name: OBASHI
overview:
OBASHI is a brand organisation that specialises in â€œbusiness clarity.â€

The company has a technology led innovation that will transform business decision making. The OBASHI brand portfolio directly addresses the key issues behind the underperformance of Information & Communications Technology enabled business change.

OBASHI is a way of thinking: a process that is supported by a methodology and software.

The company recently announced it has signed a long term global agreement with The APM Group to introduce and commercialise professional accreditation and examinations based on The OBASHI Methodology.

Ten years in the making, the OBASHI Methodology is a breakthrough in Business and Information Technology that allows key decision makers to understand the DNA of their business. For the first time, IT and business people will have a shared vision and understanding of how their business actually works and be able to make better decisions, to help meet business objectives.

OBASHI is a Scottish company based in Falkirk, UK.
